pages.text: The Matter Receiver is where a player can teleport too from a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/matter_transmitter)Matter Transmitter$(/l). Use the $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/dialing_device)Dialing Device$(/l) to dial a matter transmitter to this receiver.$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine causes reduced power consumption
Note that it is very important that the Matter Receiver has enough power. If not the player risks bad effects when teleporting
